name: Simple Google Maps
author: Stas Su»ôcov

sections.description:
This plugin is an evolution of my Lug Map.

Plugin uses post types, and markers are saved as post comments. Some of the features:

  • Admin can add markers or allow visitors to submit them (akismet helps on moderation)
  • Reverse geocoding and ajax loading of markers
  • Multiple maps can be created and used in the same time
  • Dynamic sidebar of markers can be generated
  • Very customizable
  • Uses jQuery bMap

Some screens: 1, 2
sections.installation: Please follow the standard installation procedure for WordPress plugins.
sections.faq: Please report bugs on plugin page issues tracker.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Fixed some warnings, added more security to reduce ajax cross domain requests.

1.3

  • Fixed the enqueues 404 problem, @props AllanBell

1.2

  • Fixed the annoying warning, @props AllanBell

1.1

  • Mostly readme.txt typos fixed

1.0

  • The pilot release.

short_description: An easy way to create google maps with markers and embed them in your posts. Uses post types!
